original_text: Hanun and the people who lived in Zanoah repaired the Valley Gate. They built it and they fixed its doors in their place. They made wooden bars and iron bars so that they could lock the doors. The same people also repaired 450 metres of the city wall, as far as the Dung Gate.
korean_text: 골짜기 문은 하눈과 사노아 주민이 중수하여 문을 세우며 문짝을 달고 자물쇠와 빗장을 갖추고 또 분문까지 성벽 천 규빗을 중수하였고

sentences.original_text: Hanun and the people who lived in Zanoah
and they fixed its doors in their place
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그 문들을 제자리에 고쳐 놓았다

sentences.original_text: They made wooden bars and iron bars
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나무 막대와 쇠 막대를 만들었다

sentences.original_text: so that they could lock the doors
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들이 문들을 잠글 수 있었다

sentences.original_text: The same people also repaired 450 metres of the city wall
as far as the Dung Gate
